readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You haven't learned this reading for 織 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

While you're <vocabulary>spinning and weaving</vocabulary> you are always absolutely <reading>shock</reading>ed (しょく) by what you make. You never really know when you start and then BAM! You made elephant slippers. That's just how it works and it shocks you every single time.
